name: Smaki Whisky
text: Online shop made with Next.js, TypeScript and Strapi. You can search for products by country of origin, name and type of whiskey. It has lots of features like sorting, filtering, payment simulation and much more

name: Countries Info
text: Application made with Next js, Type Script and Material Ui. With this app you can get Basic Information about any coutry in the world

name: Social Media App
text: The react app, which allows add posts, like other users posts, change your details. possibility to create own account. Project made with React, node js and mongodb. You can login with: email: user@gmail.com and passord: User123!

name: Youtube Downloader
text: With this app you can find film/music on Youtube and download it in a lot of formats and qualities

name: Book Store
text: Using this app you can find book what you want and by it, get basic information about this book like author and description. Project made with React, Redux and Gsap.

name: Wheather App
text: A web application where you can see the current weather around the world  Project made with React and Gsap.
